fulltext:
TUAN NGUYEN
DATA ENGINEER 
ntuan.nmt@gmail.com | linkedin.com/in/tuan-nguyen-bba0a1113
+84 94 6789 102 
PROFILE 
● Skilled in software development with 4+ years experience in developing large-scale distributed 
systems. 
● Experienced with data processing, algorithm and machine learning. 
● Competent analytical and problem-solving skills with distinct types of projects. 
● Experienced with various Programing Languages (Java, C++, python), Database Systems (ElasticSearch, 
Clickhouse, Redis, MongoDB) and more. 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
Coc Coc Ltd.
Mar 2015 - Current 
Coc Coc is one of the biggest local Browser and Search Engine companies in Vietnam as well as the
biggest Vietnamese digital advertising publisher with more than 25 million users. 
http://coccoc.com/en/about 
● Data Engineer, Business Intelligence dept.
Aug 2018 – Current 
- Building an ads-targeting system from almost scratch. 
- Researching, designing and building end-to-end ML pipeline which will enable ad targeting delivery. 
- Coordinate development with software engineers and resolve the dependencies with other teams. 
- Solving ad-hoc requests from sales and client support department. 
● Software Engineer, Product dept.
Mar 2017 - Aug 2018 
- Involving in numerous distinct projects of the Search Engine. 
- Being responsible for billions of documents of Crawling & Indexing system. 
- Analyzing and improving machine learning models to increase quality and business metrics. 
- Collecting, processing, storing, and using large amounts of data in effective ways. 
● Developer Intern
Sep 2016 - Mar 2017 
Participating as an intern and learning quite a lot of engineering, data mining and analyzing skills. 
● Web Analyst/Junior SE, Product dept.
Mar 2015 - Jun 2016 
- Analyzing the logics in Crawling, Indexing, Searching based on data and internal statistics. 
- Creating and improving performance of tools and reports. 
- Investigating problems of blocking from websites and contacting webmasters. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
● Programing Language: Java, C++, bash-script, python, etc.
● Database System: ElasticSearch, ELK Stack, Clickhouse, Redis, etc. 
● Big Data: Kafka, Clustering, deduplication, data streams, etc.
● Others: Linux, JVM, hashing (minhash, lsh, hll, etc.), searching/indexing, pattern design, NLP, etc. 
PROJECTS 
(I've joined from the scratch for all projects, and some are done by myself only) 
Coc Coc, Vietnam 
● Segmentation: using LGBM to segment users by genders and ages, using features of similar indexed
user and browsing history. Where the metrics are based on business value formula(most valued group
the user should be assigned to) instead of precision and recall. 
● Segmentation: a system to segment users by interest which using the results of topic modelling and
human efforts to classify user browsing history by categories. Which also including building a real-time
backend service to serve 25m MAU. 
● Engineering: designing and forming an analysis engine of multiple terabytes of data based on
ElasticSearch. 
● Natural Language Processing: a completed system to classify web pages by topic including html
parsing, main content extracting, POS Tagging, deduplication, topic modelling, etc. 
● Recommendation: leading a team of 6 engineers and analysts to build a newly news recommendation
system which based on topic modeling, similarity indexing and user analysis. 
● Engineering: a program to remove duplicate web pages of almost 5 billion docs which uses shingling,
min-hashing and local sensitive hashing. 
● Engineering: creating a complete crawler to get the entire Vietnamese whois. 
omNovos, Canada 
● Recommendation: building the core of an ads-platform for multiple clients. 
EDUCATION 
●
Computer Science 
2011 - 2015 
the College of Staten Island/CUNY, New York, USA – GPA 3.5 (not completed) 
●
Computer Science 
2010 - 2011 
Post and Telecommunication Institute of Technology Hanoi, Vietnam - GPA 3.0 (transferred) 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
